segments.text: Beijing University . Do you know where it is located ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . I live near the university . Hop in please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please help me with my luggage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , we'll put it in the trunk . Ah , it is so heavy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I packed my books in it . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
